whyChooseUs.title: Why Choose Our Subway Surfers Unblocked?
reasons: Instant Play: No download required, play directly in your browser
Completely Free: No fees, no hidden charges
Cross-platform support: Compatible with computers, tablets, and smartphones (Due to display issues with some mobile browsers, a desktop browser may be required)
Regular Updates: Synced with official versions, latest content added promptly
Unlimited Access: Break through regional and network restrictions, enjoy Subway Surfers anytime, anywhere

gameGuide.title: Game Controls Guide
instructions: Swipe Left/Right: Switch lanes, avoid obstacles
Swipe Up: Jump over obstacles or onto trains
Swipe Down: Roll under low obstacles
Double Swipe Up: Activate jetpack for temporary flight

gameTips.title: Game Tips and Strategies
tips: Prioritize collecting coin multiplier power-ups to quickly increase your score
Try to complete daily missions for extra rewards
Use power-ups wisely, like magnets to attract coins and hoverboards for temporary invincibility
Practice running on top and sides of trains to avoid most obstacles
Challenge yourself by trying different character and hoverboard combinations

TermsOfUse.title: Terms of Use
TermsOfUse.acceptanceContent: By using Subway Surfers Unblocked, you agree to comply with these terms. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use our game.
TermsOfUse.userBehaviorContent: You agree not to use our game for any illegal or unauthorized purposes. You must respect other users and comply with all applicable laws.
TermsOfUse.disclaimerContent: Subway Surfers Unblocked is provided 'as is' without any express or implied warranties. We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages.
TermsOfUse.modificationContent: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Continued use of the game will be considered acceptance of the modified terms.

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.informationCollectionContent: We do not collect any personal information from users. You can use our services anonymously without providing any personal data.
PrivacyPolicy.userAccountContent: Our services do not require user login or account creation. You can directly access and use our game without registration.
PrivacyPolicy.dataSecurityContent: As we do not collect user information, your privacy is naturally protected to the maximum extent.
PrivacyPolicy.cookieUsageContent: We may use necessary cookies to ensure basic website functionality. These cookies do not store any personal information.
PrivacyPolicy.policyUpdateContent: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We recommend that you regularly review this page for the latest information.
